verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:7
verses.text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:8
verses.text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:9
verses.text: To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:10
verses.text: To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:11
verses.text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
